name: Plunder (itch) (nickrocky213)
description:
Play as a rogue living in a city of thieves!

Your only quest is to obtain the King's crown from the Castle, however, We encourage you to look and talk around as you never know what you'll learn.

How to Play!

Use R to steal

Use E to interact with NPC's and other items

Use space to progress through dialogue
